item.title: Nate add a quote by Archibald MacLeish
item.description: "How shall freedom be defended? By arms when it is attacked by arms, by truth when it is attacked by lies, by faith when it is attacked by authoritarian dogma. Always, in the final act, by determination and faith." -- Archibald MacLeish

item.title: Nate add a quote by Karen Armstrong
item.description: "Respect only has meaning as respect for those with whom I do not agree." -- Karen Armstrong

item.title: Nate add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious - the fundamental emotion which stands at the cradle of true art and true science." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Nate add a quote by Karen Armstrong
item.description: "The only way to show a true respect for God is to act morally while ignoring God’s existence." -- Karen Armstrong

item.title: Nate add a quote by Corbin
item.description: "Life is too short to sit around and wait." -- Corbin

item.title: Nate add a quote by Terryl L. Givens
item.description: "The secret of happiness is this: let your interests be as wide as possible,” he said. He then made his point with the simple example of a taste for strawberries. “There is no abstract and impersonal proof either that strawberries are good or that they are not good. To the man who likes them they are good, to the man who dislikes them they are not. But the man who likes them has a pleasure which the other does not have; to that extent his life is more enjoyable and he is better adapted to the world in which both must live. . . . The more things a man is interested in, the more opportunities of happiness he has." -- Terryl L. Givens
